cVegRoot.Name: fraction of NPP to cRoot
cVegRoot.Comment: it was 1/3, to make it consistent with the Dynamic Allocation of Friedlingstein, we make it 0.3; if isTree==0 then 0.5 - this is allocation to below ground (roots) which is then partitioned according to Rf2Rc

cVegWood.Name: fraction of NPP to cWood
cVegWood.Comment: it was 1/3, to make it consistent with the Dynamic Allocation of Friedlingstein, we make it 0.3; if isTree==0 then 0

cVegLeaf.Name: fraction of NPP to cLeaf
cVegLeaf.Comment: it was 1/3, to make it consistent with the Dynamic Allocation of Friedlingstein, we make it 0.4; if isTree==0 then 0.5

devStage.comment: experimental: try-out, tested: runs and produces sane output, consolidated: tested and used for scientific purpose, published: for published approach
